claim: Valerian and the City of a Thousand Planets is based on a French science fiction comic.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The film is based on the French science fiction comics series Valérian and Laureline , written by Pierre Christin and illustrated by Jean-Claude Mézières .

claim: Valerian and the City of a Thousand Planets is based on a French science fiction comic.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Valérian and Laureline  (  Valérian et Laureline  )  , also known as Valérian : Spatio-Temporal Agent  (  Valérian , agent spatio-temporel  )  or just Valérian , is a French science fiction comics series , created by writer Pierre Christin and artist Jean-Claude Mézières .
